where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_svc_order set BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORDER_NO = #{ordererMb,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.jc.pico.utils.mybatis.typehandler.MobileSecurityTypeHandler}, RECEIPT_ID = #{receiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TM_LOCAL = #{orderTmLocal,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_TM = #{orderTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE_NO = #{reserveNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RESERVE_TM = #{reserveTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE_TM_LOCAL = #{reserveTmLocal,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE_END_TM = #{reserveEndTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE_END_TM_LOCAL = #{reserveEndTmLocal,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE_REG_TM = #{readyTmLocal,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CANCEL_TP = #{cancelTp,jdbcType=CHAR}, USE_COUPON = #{useCoupon,jdbcType=BIT}, SALES = #{sales,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SUPPLY_VALUE = #{supplyValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TAX = #{tax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SERVICE_CHARGE = #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CUSTOMER_CNT = #{customerCnt,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PAY_METHOD = #{payMethod,jdbcType=CHAR}, TABLE_NO = #{tableNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON = #{person,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POS_NO = #{posNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMISSION_TM = #{admissionTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXIT_TM = #{exitTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CUSTOMER_TP = #{customerTp,jdbcType=CHAR}, CUSTOME_AGE_TP = #{customeAgeTp,jdbcType=CHAR}, CUSTOME_GENDER = #{customeGender,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_SALES = #{isSales,jdbcType=BIT}, IS_CONFIRM = #{isConfirm,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_svc_order
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT ID, DATE_FORMAT(ORDER_TM_LOCAL, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PAY_DAY , ORDER_NO , TIME_FORMAT(ORDER_TM_LOCAL, '%H:%i:%s') AS PAY_TIME , ORDER_ST , IF(ORDER_ST = 607003, (SALES * -1), SALES) AS SALES , IF(ORDER_ST = 607003, (DISCOUNT * -1), DISCOUNT) AS DISCOUNT , IF(ORDER_ST = 607003, ((SALES - DISCOUNT) * -1), (SALES - DISCOUNT)) AS REAL_SALES , IF(ORDER_ST = 607003, (((SALES - DISCOUNT) - TAX) * -1), ((SALES - DISCOUNT) - TAX)) AS TAX , IF(ORDER_ST = 607003, (((SALES - DISCOUNT) - ((SALES - DISCOUNT) - TAX)) * -1), ((SALES - DISCOUNT) - ((SALES - DISCOUNT) - TAX))) AS NET_SALES FROM TB_SVC_ORDER WHERE ORDER_NO != '' AND BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AND STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AND SALES_TM_LOCAL BETWEEN DATE_ADD(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL 0 SECOND) AND DATE_ADD(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERVAL '23:59:59' HOUR_SECOND)
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_svc_order SET ORDER_ST = #{orderSt,jdbcType=CHAR}, SALES = SALES * -1, SUPPLY_VALUE = SUPPLY_VALUE * -1, TAX = TAX * -1, CANCEL_TM = NOW(), CANCEL_TM_LOCAL = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

UPDATE tb_svc_sales SET ORDER_ST = #{orderSt,jdbcType=CHAR}, SALES = SALES * -1, ACTUAL_SALES_AMT = ACTUAL_SALES_AMT * -1, TAX = TAX * -1, SUPPLY_VALUE = SUPPLY_VALUE * -1, CANCEL_TM = NOW(), CANCEL_TM_LOCAL = NOW() WHERE BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ORDER_ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
